00008 JsonParser::JsonParser(QObject* parent)
00009     : QObject(parent)
00010 {
00011     _d.reset(new Aki::JsonParserPrivate(this));
00012     _d->parser = QSharedPointer<QJson::Parser>(new QJson::Parser);
00013 }

00016 {
00017     _d->serverList.clear();

00104 bool
00105 JsonParser::write(QIODevice* device)
00106 {
00107     Q_UNUSED(device);
00108     Aki::Server::Ptr server(new Aki::Server(QLatin1String("Bouncer")));
00109 //    server->setAddressList(QStringList() << QLatin1String("bnc.kollide.net/7778") << QLatin1String("chat.freenode.net/7000"));
00110     server->setAutoIdentify(false);
00111     server->setAutoJoinChannels(false);
00112     server->setAutoReconnection(true);
00113 //     server->setChannelList(QStringList() << QLatin1String("aki") << QLatin1String("##C++") << QLatin1String("#gentoo")
00114 //     << QLatin1String("#gentoo-chat") << QLatin1String("#qt") << QLatin1String("#kde") << QLatin1String("#kde-bindings")
00115 //     << QLatin1String("#kde-devel") << QLatin1String("#python") << QLatin1String("#amarok") << QLatin1String("#kde-cafe")
00116 //     << QLatin1String("#kdevelop") << QLatin1String("#qtwebkit") << QLatin1String("#html") << QLatin1String("#xml")
00117 //     << QLatin1String("#kde-usability") << QLatin1String("#cmake") << QLatin1String("#kde"));
00118     server->setConnectOnStartup(true);
00119     server->setConnectToRandomServer(false);
00120     server->setDefaultEncoding(true);
00121     server->setEncoding("UTF-8");
00122     server->setRetryAttempts(100);
00123     server->setRetryInterval(10);
00124     server->setServiceName(QLatin1String("NickServ"));
00125     server->setServicePassword(QLatin1String("rockets"));
00126     _d->serverList << server;
00127 
00128     QVariantMap jsonMap;
00129     foreach (const Aki::Server::Ptr& s, _d->serverList) {
00130         _d->writeNetworkName(s, &jsonMap);
00131         _d->writeReconnection(s, &jsonMap);
00132         _d->writeRetryInterval(s, &jsonMap);
00133         _d->writeRetryAttempts(s, &jsonMap);
00134         _d->writeConnectionOptions(s, &jsonMap);
00135         _d->writeServers(s, &jsonMap);
00136         _d->writeChannels(s, &jsonMap);
00137         _d->writeEncoding(s, &jsonMap);
00138         _d->writeIdentity(s, &jsonMap);
00139     }
00140     //QJson::Serializer serializer;
00141     //qDebug() << serializer.serialize(jsonMap);
00142     return true;
00143 }
